channel.title: CVE Feed for Synopsys -- Synopsys Jenkins Coverity Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synopsys -- Synopsys Jenkins Coverity Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-23850|2024-08-02T10:42:26.801Z -- synopsys -- synopsys%20jenkins%20coverity%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Synopsys Jenkins Coverity Plugin 3.0.2 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2023-23848|2024-08-02T10:42:26.831Z -- synopsys -- synopsys%20jenkins%20coverity%20plugin
item.description: Missing permission checks in Synopsys Jenkins Coverity Plugin 3.0.2 and earlier allow attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP server using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2023-23847|2024-08-02T10:42:27.067Z -- synopsys -- synopsys%20jenkins%20coverity%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Synopsys Jenkins Coverity Plugin 3.0.2 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP server using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.
